column4: how did you get your desktop to look like that? is it all just a theme? what all did you have to do?

why dont you use vino instead?

is the computer that you are trying to vnc to running gnome?
yes, it is much better, and you probably already have it installed without knowing

you don't need a howto. System>Prefs>Remote Desktop
